![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ptsag/ptsag.github.io/main/paul-tsagaroulis.jpg){#id .class width=200 height=200px} 

Hello. I help improve the workforce using data-driven methods. 

I have more than 15 years of experience in [people analytics](people-analytics.html) and a PhD in Business Psychology (industrial-organizational track) from the Chicago School of Professional Psychology.

I'm passionate about data visualization, especially the *seeing* & *thinking* of data. I've [presented](presentations.html) best practices in data visualization at national conferences and workshops. My research interest is in developing a better understanding of how data visualization practices may help facilitate comprehension. [Read more](research.html).

Connect with me via [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ptsag/).
